name: Update Google Sheets with form responses from Google Forms for valid emails and send a Slack message
description: Every time a Google Forms response is submitted, Make will automatically validate the email output of the form with ZeroBounce. If the email status is "valid" it will add a new row to a Google Sheet and send a Slack message. This example uses the sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1l205VTOGWG-wurkvc2UmsbVnN0cJbX-6evHJnWcMfaM/edit#gid=0).
